meaningMnemonic: A <radical>canopy</radical> is over your <radical>car</radical> because your car is in <kanji>storage</kanji> in a large <kanji>storehouse</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: Your car is in this <kanji>storage</kanji> <kanji>warehouse</kanji>, just sitting there. A <reading>子</reading> (こ) notices this, and decides to take your car on a joyride. You won't notice, right? You never drive it.
